groups.title: (一) 听短对话后口头回答问题

title_urls.content: (一)听短对话后口头回答问题
title_urls.name: a822191703f04be285be.mp3

directions_urls.content: 第一节听下面3段对话，每段对话后有一个小题，请根据对话内容选出每个问题的最佳答案。听对话前，你有5秒钟的读题时间，听完每段对话后，你有5秒钟的答题时间，每段对话和问题读两遍。
directions_urls.name: 19500220f2c24ea682b9.mp3

questions.directions: 第一节 听下面3段对话，每段对话后有一个小题，请根据对话内容选出每个问题的最佳答案。听对话前，你有5秒钟的读题时间，听完每段对话后，你有5秒钟的答题时间，每段对话和问题读两遍。

directions_urls.content: 第二节听下面两段长对话，听对话前，你有5秒钟的读题时间，听完每段对话后，每小题你有5秒钟的答题时间。每段对话读两遍。听第一段对话，回答第1、2、3小题。
directions_urls.name: f5c5118e6f8547a89149.mp3

subs.directions:
第一节 听下面两段长对话，听对话前，你有5秒钟的读题时间，听完每段对话后，每小题你有5秒钟的答题时间。每段对话读两遍 。 
听第一段对话，回答第1  、2、  3小题。

subs.body: What is the weather like in London now?
What present will Lucy buy for her mother?
How does Mary go to work every day?
answer: How does Mary go to work every day?

directions_urls.name: 671ad338dcfb405e961c.mp3
directions_urls.content: 现在，你有5秒钟的时间阅读第1小题的内容。

subs.directions: 现在，你有5秒钟的时间阅读第1小题的内容。

body_urls.content:
M: Lucy, who bought you the new bike, your mother or father?

W: Neither. It is a gift from my elder brother.
body_urls.name: 9d0003b7ede04f62a5667702c223922b.mp3

body_urls.content:
M: Look at the dark clouds in the sky.

W: A heavy rain is on the way.
body_urls.name: 88939ebc1e6d4f83bf75f42a7e46a94c.mp3

body_urls.content:
W: The concert starts at 8 o'clock.

M: We still have half an hour to get there.
body_urls.name: 2ffaebd6988646bc96f114ac7553bc38.mp3

subs.body: It was Sunday morning. David and Sam were going to the cinema by bus. When they got on the bus, it ran slowly along Park Road. At the crossing there were traffic lights. They were red. The bus had to stop. After a while, the traffic lights turned green. The bus began to move again. At that time, David and Sam saw a taxi. It came along George Street very fast. The traffic lights were red again, but it was too late. The taxi hit the bus. Luckily, the people on the bus weren't hurt. And the taxi driver was also all right. At last, some policemen came.

directions_urls.content: 现在，你有25秒钟的时间阅读第7至9小题。
directions_urls.name: d39c316832934da2b156.mp3

subs.directions: 现在，你有25秒钟的时间阅读第7至9小题。

subs.body:
When did the accident happen?

(on Friday morning / on Saturday morning / on Sunday morning)

Where were David and Sam going?

(to the cinema / to the library / to the park)
How did David and Sam go there?
